amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the language allowing the Secretary of Energy to make $48 million available for the purpose of carrying out domestic uranium enrichment research, development, and demonstration activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike langauge providing that the Secretary of Energy may make $48,000,000 available for the purpose of carrying out domestic uranium enrichment research, development, and demonstration activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 291 (Roll no. 336).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 291 (Roll no. 336).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Burgess.
